subtitle: Pork escalopes are cooked with peaches and served with a creamy sauce and served with tagliatelle in this all-in-one recipe.

method.text: Heat the oil in a pan. Fry the pork for 4-5 min on each side. Remove from pan. Keep hot.
Add onion to pan. Cook until just soft. Remove with slotted spoon. Keep to one side.
Add peaches and stock. Bring to the boil, reduce heat and simmer for about 10 min.
Stir in the soured cream. Heat through but don't allow to boil (otherwise it will curdle). Season to taste.
Meanwhile, cook the pasta according to pack instructions. Drain. Transfer to a hot serving dish.
Arrange the pork on top. Pour over the cream sauce. Add a sprinkling of paprika.

title: Peachy pork
